        Parameters:
        x - Value to be mapped.
        a1 - Minimum value for range A.
        a2 - Maximum value for range A.
        b1 - Minimum value for range B.
        b2 - Maximum value for range B.

      • random16

        public static double random16()
        Deprecated. Use Math.random()
        Random float from 0 to 1 with 16 bits of randomness. Standard Math.random() creates repetitive patterns when applied over larger space.
